key.name: db-path
key.description: Absolute path to the last used database

key.name: show-next-otp
key.description: If enabled, when the current OTP expires, the next one is shown too

key.name: notification-enabled
key.description: If enabled, a notification will pop-up everytime an OTP is copied

key.name: search-column
key.description: Select whether searching will be done on the Account or Issuer column

key.name: dark-theme
key.description: Whether the application should use a dark theme.

key.name: auto-lock
key.description: Whether to auto lock the application or not

key.name: auto-lock-timeout
key.description: Lock the application on idle after the specified amount of minutes

key.name: secret-service
key.description: Whether to use the secret service to handle the password
